item.title: Ryan Seacrest Just Snagged Another Hottie
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesRyan Seacrest has done it again. Asked an asinine question on the red carpet or made a cheesy joke on …

Ryan Seacrest Just Snagged Another Hottie was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Ryan Seacrest has done it again.

Asked an asinine question on the red carpet or made a cheesy joke on live television?

No, not this time at least.

Instead, the uber producer and former American Idol host has managaed to, once again, snag himself a very sexy girlfriend.

After having been spotted out on the town in New York City with Adriana Lima, sources have confirmed to E! News and other outlets that Seacrest and the Victoria’s Secret model really are dating.

They really are an item.

Seacrest may very well have already seen Adriana Lima nude, and not just because it’s her job to take off many layers of clothing on the catwalk.

According to anonymous sources, Lima and Seacrest connected this summer in Rio during the 2016 Summer Olympics.

They grabbed a bite to eat at Dell’Anima in the Big Apple over the weekend and have yet to comment on their romance in public.

But they have sort of made it official via Instagram. 

See what we mean here:

Lima has two daughters with Serbian NBA player Marko Jarić.

She also may have hooked up with Justin Bieber, making it clear that she has a thing for men with boyish good looks.

We guess that would explain why she’d go for Seacrest.

But what explains Seacrest’s perennial good great amazing luck with the ladies? Consider:

He has previously dated Sophie Monk:

And Katrina Darrell:

And Jasmine Waltz:

And Shayna Terese Taylor:

And, perhaps most famously, Julianne Hough:

It must therefore be asked: What the heck is going on here?!?

How does Ryan Seacrest have a more impressing dating resume that Matt Damon?

Is it a money thing? The guy isn’t poor, we know that much…

15 Top Reality TV Salaries: Who’s Making the Biggest Bucks Just For Being …

VIEW GALLERY

Please let us know, ladies. The mystery is killing us!

Ryan Seacrest Just Snagged Another Hottie was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Justin Bieber: A Chronological List of 31 Women Who Slept With Him For Some Reason
item.dc:creator: pauldailly
item.description:
To say that Justin Bieber has had a lot of gal pals during his time in the limelight is like …

Justin Bieber: A Chronological List of 31 Women Who Slept With Him For Some Reason was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
To say that Justin Bieber has had a lot of gal pals during his time in the limelight is like saying Selena Gomez has issues related to him.

It’s so obvious, it barely even needs to be stated.

A number of confirmed relationships, along with a string of flings, have made it abundantly clear that he’s enjoyed the trappings of fame.

Still, you may be surprised at just how much so.

We’ve compiled a list of Bieber’s extensive relationship history from the onset of his rise to music stardom to the present, and wow. 

Just, wow. Here’s hoping he uses protection.

Justin Bieber: A Chronological List of 31 Women Who Slept With Him For Some Reason was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Julian Edelman and Adriana Lima: Dating!
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesWe now know that Tom Brady will definitely miss the first four weeks of the 2016 NFL season due to …

Julian Edelman and Adriana Lima: Dating! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

We now know that Tom Brady will definitely miss the first four weeks of the 2016 NFL season due to his Deflategate suspension.

And while most folks in the New England Patriots organization are still grieving over the fact that they’ll be missing one of their team’s two key ingredients (Bill Belichick’s sleeveless hoodies have not been banned by the league … yet.), wide receiver Julian Edelman seems to be loving life these days.

Of course, that could have little to do with his hopes for the Patriots’ season and everything to do with the fact that he’s banging a Victoria’s Secret model.

Yes, according to TMZ Edelman and Adriana Lima are dating.

It’s great news for him, because, well … Adriana Lima looks like this:

But it’s not great news for Pats fans, as no one can be bothered to worry about catching footballs when they’re regularly having sex with Adriana Lima. It’s not possible.

Sure, Brady’s been married to a supermodel for years, but he was grown in a lab using shards of Joe Theismann’s fibula.

The guy’s thought about nothing but football his entire life.

With Edelman, we’re dealing with an actual human being.

If he can get over the fact Lima may have banged Justin Bieber, this could turn into a serious relationship, while may mean the end of his career. 

Of course, on the bright side, this could also mean an end to Edelman’s random Tinder hookups and embarrassing post-coital selfies posted by over-zealous fangirls.

We feel like Rob Gronkowski already has the task of sexing the entire population of Massachusetts well in hand, ya know?

17 Sexiest Adriana Lima Pics

VIEW GALLERY

Julian Edelman and Adriana Lima: Dating! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Adriana Lima Shoots Down Justin Bieber Sex Rumor
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Andy Cohen got right down to business during a chat with Adriana Lima on Bravo’s Watch What Happens Live this week. …

Adriana Lima Shoots Down Justin Bieber Sex Rumor was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Andy Cohen got right down to business during a chat with Adriana Lima on Bravo’s Watch What Happens Live this week.

Seated alongside the gorgeous model, Cohen asked point blank whether Lima ever got down to NAKED business with Justin Bieber… if you know what we mean!

We mean this: did Lima ever hook up with Bieber, as rumors on the World Wide Web claimed in the spring of 2014?

“Where did you read that?!” Lima responded, before saying NO several times.

Sorry, Justin. But she doesn’t just deny the chatter in this video. She seems rather turned off by it.

Fellow guest Padma Lakshmi at first supported Lima, saying Bieber has to be too short for her to even consider, but then she added:

"Although he would be right at your boobs. It would be perfect for him.”

Lima, however, went on to reveal something personal about her taste in men, telling Cohen, Lakshmi and all viewers:

“Let me tell you this… Anybody below 6-foot-7, you know how I call them? Friends.”

Wow. That sure narrows Lima’s dating pool by a large margin, huh?

Bieber, meanwhile, was also romantically linked to another supermodel last year. And we’re yet to hear Miranda Kerr deny the talk that she got it on with the short singer.

Check out Lima’s disgusted response to chatter over her supposed sexual rendezvous with Bieber now:

Adriana Lima Shoots Down Justin Bieber Sex Rumor was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Justin Bieber Totes Hooked Up with Adriana Lima: Report
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteAccording to a new report, Justin Bieber is fulfilling his mission to have sex with beautiful women. The MOST beautiful, in …

Justin Bieber Totes Hooked Up with Adriana Lima: Report was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

According to a new report, Justin Bieber is fulfilling his mission to have sex with beautiful women.

The MOST beautiful, in fact.

An insider tells Us Weekly that Bieber hooked up with Adriana Lima at the Cannes Film Festival last week, as the artist headed straight toward the model at once she caught his eye at a party on May 20.

"Justin pursued her hard," says a friend of Lima’s, who split from husband Marko Jaric in May after five years of marriage.

 

At a private house party later that evening, the tabloid adds, "they were talking nonstop [and] went home together around 5 a.m."

We wonder what they did there.

Bieber posted a photo of himself and the Victoria’s Secret beauty on Instagram a few days ago, writing a lyric from "Confident" as his caption: "I think she foreign, I think she foreign."

It was allegedly a very busy Bieber bedroom last week in France.

Sources claim he also slept with Barbara Palvin and he continued to flirt with Yovanna Ventura online.

That sad sound you hear in the distance is Selena Gomez crying.

Justin Bieber Totes Hooked Up with Adriana Lima: Report was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
